user_device_rel: 1 person to n devices; n people to m devices
devices_included: Any screen device; any device with a web browser
use_cases_desc:
- Collaborative paper writing: multiple users can collaboratively write on a document each in their own personal editors
- Presentation: slides can be distributed across multiple devices, and each device can show a different part of the UI (i.e. slides, speaker notes, audience questions)
contribution_desc: Webstrates is an instantiation of the software paradigm of shareable dynamic media where content can be distributed across multiple devices, it can be shared with others, and the software itself is malleable meaning and users can reappropriate it to their needs at hand (i.e. change the software behavior and interaction during runtime).
use_cases: Presentation; Paper writing; Writing; Collaborative paper authoring; Entertainment; Leisure; collaboration
interaction_techniques: Cross-device task chaining; UI distribution; Remote control
toolkits: NodeJS; ShareJS; JsonML; MongoDB; CoffeeScript; JavaScript
